name: The Flying Kitchen by Shannon Vavich

episodes.title: Live with Gareth Gore | Author of Opus: The Cult of Dark Money Inside the Catholic Church
episodes.description:
🔥 This Thursday! I’m finally sitting down with Gareth Gore, author of Opus: The Cult of Dark Money, Human Trafficking, and Right-Wing Conspiracy Inside the Catholic Church — the book I’ve been championing for months.

Opus exposes the networks of power linking the U.S. Supreme Court, the Heritage Foundation, and the far-right faction of the Catholic Church — from José María Escrivá’s founding of Opus Dei to its modern reach into Project 2025 and the current Court’s super-majority.

📘 Just in time for the release of the paperback!
Join us Thursday 6 p.m. EET / 12 p.m. ET / 9 a.m. PT on YouTube and Facebook.
I’ll ask a few questions, but I want yours too — if you’ve read the book, this is your chance to talk directly with the author.

Let’s dig into the intersections of faith, power, and truth.

#Opus #OpusBook #GarethGore
